title: hydroshare_accessing_aorc_and_hydrofabric_on_ciroh_jupyterhub
Summary: AORC and Hydrofabric datasets are accessed and analyzed via JupyterHub linked to HydroShare. The CIROH Jupyterhub environment enables users to work with these high-value community datasets for hydrological modeling.

title: hydroshare_alluvial_river_width_variability
Summary: Alluvial River Width Variability compiles bankfull geometry data, lidar-derived river widths for 67 sites, and hydrograph metrics. The resource offers bank line coordinates and filtered width data, enabling analysis of downstream hydraulic geometry.

title: hydroshare_analysis_of_precipitation_data_across_the_logan_river_watershed_for_the_year_201
Summary: Analyzes precipitation data (AORC & PRISM) across the Logan River Watershed. It compares the basin's average daily precipitation and saves results back to HydroShare, using provided code and input files.

title: hydroshare_aorc_atmospheric_forcing_data_across_camels_us_basins_1980_2024
Summary: AORC atmospheric forcings (1980-2024) are summarized over CAMELS US basins, utilizing updated basin delineations from Andy Wood based on USGS GagesII. The data preparation code is derived from a GitHub repository focused on forcing preparation.

title: hydroshare_basin_characteristics_and_streambow_statistics_for_the_usgs_stream_gage_chester_
Summary: USGS stream gage Chester's basin characteristics and streamflow statistics are presented.

title: hydroshare_basin_characteristics_at_shawnee_ks
Summary: Basin characteristics for Shawnee, KS, obtained from the USGS StreamStats on June 19, 2024, are provided. Data was accessed and shared on HydroShare as part of the NWC Summer Institute demo.

title: hydroshare_ciroh_2i2c_jupyterhub
Summary: CIROH 2I2C JupyterHub provides a production environment for CIROH users, accessible via a web interface. It offers a platform for data analysis and computational tasks, requiring users to request access through ciroh-it-admin@ua.edu.

title: hydroshare_ciroh_community_page

title: hydroshare_ciroh_enabling_collaboration_through_data_and_model_sharing_with_cuahsi_hydrosha

title: hydroshare_clear_creek_at_golden_colorado_usgs_06719505_nextgen_v22_hydrofabric_and_aorc_fo
Summary: This resource provides Nextgen model inputs for Clear Creek, CO. It contains a v2.2 hydrofabric geopackage and 1979-2024 AORC v1.1 forcings in Nextgen-compliant netCDF format.

title: hydroshare_daily_aorc_meteorological_forcings_1979_2023_for_nextgen_camels_hydrofabric_catc
Summary: This HydroShare resource provides a remapped daily version of the AORC meteorological forcings (1979-2023) for 671 CAMELS basins, spatially averaged to Hydrofabric catchments using a conservative remapping technique and made available in NetCDF format.
